titles.title: Small Business Growth Through Exports Act of 2013
To amend the Small Business Jobs Act of 2010 to extend and expand the State Trade and Export Promotion (STEP) Grant Program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Small Business.

bill.summary: 9/17/2013--Introduced. Small Business Growth Through Exports Act of 2013 - Amends the Small Business Jobs Act to extend, and increase the authorization of appropriations for, the State Trade and Export Promotion Grant Program through FY2016.
